text: Are xeꞌrilo, xubꞌij chike: Jix, jiꞌkꞌutu iwibꞌ chkiwach ri chꞌawenelabꞌ cho ri Dios pa kiwiꞌ ri winaq.17:14 Ri Jesús xubꞌij che ri achi chi kuꞌkꞌutu ribꞌ cho ri chꞌawenel cho ri Dios. Ri chꞌawenel cho ri Dios are riꞌ ri achi ri katzujuw sipanik cho ri Dios we xkunataj ri chꞌaꞌk jeriꞌ kubꞌij ri utaqanik ri Moisés. Are ri chꞌawenel cho ri Dios kabꞌin la che ri winaq we utz chik katzijon kukꞌ ri winaq. Levítico 13:1-46.
